headline: Packaging Corp. price target lowered to $236 from $253 at Wells Fargo
summary: Wells Fargo analyst Gabe Hajde lowered the firm’s price target on Packaging Corp. (PKG) to $236 from $253 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. Despite Wednesday’s share price reaction, Packaging Corp. remains well on track to deliver double digits profit growth in 2025 on above-industry volume growth, best in class returns, and net leverage well below the peer group average, the firm says. headline: Layoffs, closures announced by Dow, Orbis, Greif in January
summary: Packaging Corporation of America and RR Donnelley also gave notice of upcoming packaging-related closures and layoffs.

headline: Packaging Corp of America (PKG) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Sales and Strategic ...
summary: Packaging Corp of America (PKG) reports robust fourth-quarter results with record net income and sales, while navigating inflationary pressures and operational inefficiencies.
